Posts.EditableText: Hello, I've been playing Quest for a while and I've been interested in making an rpg game. I was wondering how I could do this because after looking over all the commands Quest offers (online for my mobile device) I don't think I could pull it off. Please help.
Posts.HTML: Hello, I've been playing Quest for a while and I've been interested in making an rpg game. I was wondering how I could do this because after looking over all the commands Quest offers (online for my mobile device) I don't think I could pull it off. Please help.

Posts.EditableText: What RPG features are you looking to implement? Most, if not all can be done but require use of scripting.
